column6: North}}</ref> died aged 152) was the twelth [[Chieftain of the Dúnedain]].

column1: In the days of his father, [[Arassuil]], the [[Orcs of the Misty Mountains]] emerged again. Arathorn succeeded Arassuil, on his death in {{TA
column3: n}}. Arathorn himself was killed violently<ref group=note>This is deduced from the dagger symbol (†) next to his death date in the [[Appendix A]], although the narrative doesn't mention anything about his life; it's possible he was killed by Orcs, like others of his line.</ref> in {{TA
column5: n}}; he was succeeded by his son, [[Argonui]].<ref name="North"/>

column1: The etymology of ''Arathorn'' is uncertain. See [[Arathorn II]] for discussion.

column2:
house=[[House of Isildur]]
Cadet branch of [[House of Elros]]
